definition: (of sb's words) to count/can be trusted
to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
to do as promised/to be as good as one's word/to honor one's word/to mean what one says

sentences.english: We know what the rich man says.
sentences.chinese: 那個富人總是說話算話。

sentences.english: In friendship, your word as your honor is a given.
sentences.chinese: 在友誼裏，你說話算話就會有好聲譽。

sentences.english: I don't understand why my boyfriend finds it so hard to keep his word.
sentences.chinese: 我不懂爲何我的男友會覺得說話算話那麼難。

sentences.english: We know that she is believable, so we trust her.
sentences.chinese: 我們知道她一向說話算話，所以我們信任她。

sentences.english: My friends, God keeps His word.
sentences.chinese: 親愛的朋友，神說話算話。

sentences.english: I guess she meant what she said. They're just doing a random search.
sentences.chinese: 我猜她說話算話，他們只是在做一項抽查而已。

sentences.english: I am a man of my word so what do you want of mine?
sentences.chinese: 我說話算話，你想要我的什麼東西？

sentences.english: What the rich man says is always taken seriously.
sentences.chinese: 那個富人總是說話算話。

sentences.english: He will show them that he is true to his words.
sentences.chinese: 他將讓他們看到，他是說話算話的。
